articles.description: Willian grabs an injury-time winner from the penalty spot as Fulham beat Wolves in the Premier League.
articles.title: Willian nets late penalty for Fulham to sink Wolves

articles.description: Once it was China, not Saudi Arabia, on a multi-million pound recruitment drive to buy in the world's best football talent. In just a few years though, the Chinese Super League's big-money plans have imploded.
articles.title: From bidding for Bale to selling the team bus - the fall of the CSL

articles.description: Lionel Messi's arrival at Inter Miami is 'gripping' the United States and improving the trajectory of MLS, writes Guillem Balague.
articles.title: 'Messi mania one of biggest revolutions in US sport'

articles.description: The Carolina Panthers sack head coach Frank Reich after starting the season with one win in 11 games.
articles.title: Carolina Panthers sack coach Reich after 1-10 start

articles.description: Wolves manager Gary O'Neil says bad refereeing decisions are affecting "reputations" and "livelihoods" after his side's controversial Premier League defeat at Fulham.
articles.title: 'Livelihoods & reputations impacted' - O'Neil says VAR has 'cost us'

articles.description: Juventus saw out a 1-1 draw as "boredom reigned supreme" for visitors Inter Milan on Sunday, writes BBC Sport columnist Mina Rzouki.
articles.title: 'Inter Italy's best but dull Juve title contenders'

articles.description: Jalen Hurts scores a walk-off touchdown as the Philadelphia Eagles win an overtime thriller against the Buffalo Bills while Bill Belichick's job is on the line after another Patriots defeat.
articles.title: Hurts the hero as Eagles win overtime classic

articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola wants his team to nail down top spot in their Champions League group on Tuesday.
articles.title: Guardiola urges Man City to wrap up top spot

articles.description: Terry Venables' impact as manager of Barcelona cannot be underestimated, writes Spanish football expert Guillem Balague.
articles.title: 'A special man and trailblazer - Venables' lasting legacy at Barca'

articles.description: England batter Harry Brook claims the top prize at the 2023 Cricket Writers' Club awards.
articles.title: Brook and Sciver-Brunt claim top Cricket Writers' Club awards
